trans-unit.source: Log on to the [Azure Management Portal], click **Mobile Services**, click your mobile service, then click the **Dashboard** tab.
trans-unit.target: Log on to the [Azure Management Portal], click **Mobile Services**, click your mobile service, then click the **Dashboard** tab.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) If you have already set the Mobile Services or Websites source control credentials for your Azure subscription, then you can skip down to step 4.
trans-unit.target: (Optional) If you have already set the Mobile Services or Websites source control credentials for your Azure subscription, then you can skip down to step 4.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, click **Set up source control** under **Quick glance** and click **Yes** to confirm.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, click **Set up source control** under **Quick glance** and click **Yes** to confirm.

trans-unit.source: Supply a **User name**, **New password**, confirm the password, then click the check button.
trans-unit.target: Supply a **User name**, **New password**, confirm the password, then click the check button.

trans-unit.source: The Git repository is created in your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: The Git repository is created in your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Make a note of the credentials you just supplied; you will use them to access this and other Mobile Services repositories in your subscription.
trans-unit.target: Make a note of the credentials you just supplied; you will use them to access this and other Mobile Services repositories in your subscription.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Configure** tab and notice the **Source control** fields.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Configure** tab and notice the **Source control** fields.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the Git repository is displayed.
trans-unit.target: The URL of the Git repository is displayed.

trans-unit.source: You will use this URL to clone the repository to your local computer.
trans-unit.target: You will use this URL to clone the repository to your local computer.

trans-unit.source: With source control enabled in your mobile service, you can use Git to clone the repository to your local computer.
trans-unit.target: With source control enabled in your mobile service, you can use Git to clone the repository to your local computer.
